aboutDescription: I'm a Computer Engineer from TMSL, Kolkata looking for challenging full time opportunities. I like to learn new technologies and I'm always ready to hone my skills. I love to solve real life problems using my coding skills . I'm enthusiastic coder with hands-on experience on different development projects.

projectsArray.name: News-Time
projectsArray.description: News-Time - a news aggregator app developed over News API.

projectsArray.name: Casting Agency
projectsArray.description: RESTful API implemented for managing movies and actors for a casting agency.

projectsArray.name: Go-World
projectsArray.description: Social Media application for like minded people where user can create group with like-minded people.

projectsArray.name: Travel Planner
projectsArray.description: App will record a trip starting date with the weather status & an image of the location which you intend to go.

footer: I'm actively looking for full-time Software Engineering opportunities! If you know of any available positions, if you have any questions, or if you just want to say hi, please feel free to email me at
